suite.name: exemplo API ServeRest

test.name: Testar a API pública de estudos serverest

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=API_serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '113'} body=b'{"nome": "Emilly Cardoso", "email": "ninada-cruz@example.net", "password": "2R3WYgfni@", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
